attributes.action: Enquiry why Thameslink East Mids Trains start new timetable and no trains to run
attributes.additional_details:
25th May saw 39 cancelled services serving between Bedford and London.

Today 29th May already at writing Thameslink are showing 20 cancellations during the day.

http://www.realtimetrains.co.uk/search/advanced/BDM/2018/05/29/0000-2359?stp=C&show=all&order=wtt&toc=TL
attributes.background: 20th May saw a new timetable between Bedford Luton and London. Why did this go ahead knowing trains couldn’t operate the full new timetable, now passengers face mass cancellations and travel chaos. Bring back TL rail and East Mids Trains to public ownership to end chaos and a timetable that works

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

In particular, we're not sure whether you'd like an inquiry into the introduction of the new timetable or whether you'd like the UK Government to take over running East Midlands Trains. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
